content: the string of spaces making a single crochet stitch into each of the spaces and working chain 6 between the single crochets chain 6 rotate your work clockwise so that the string of spaces is to the left of your hook then single_crochet in the space to the left of your last single_crochet repeat chain 6 single_crochet in next space along the string of spaces including into last space rotate your work clockwise to continue working into the other side of the string of spaces repeat chain 6 single_crochet in next space into every space on the other side of the base this round has twice as many spaces as you had in your base string mine has 24 12 on one side and 12 on the other pictured below subsequent rounds continue working round and round in the same direction rotating your work repeating chain 6 single_crochet in next space there is no need to mark the beginning of each round as you will simply continue to work a single crochet into each space with 6 chains between until the desired bag height is reached i suggest about 28cm/11 you just need to finish at the same side as your starting tail to end with a complete round handles lay your bag out flat so that one side of the bag is facing you dividing the number of spaces you have across the side of your bag by 3 you will be working 1/3 spaces skipping 1/3 then working the remaining 1/3 for each side of the bag if you have 10 spaces you will work 3 skip 4 work 3 if you have 11 spaces you will work 4 skip 3 work 4 if you have 12 spaces you will work 4 skip 4 work 4 if you have 13 spaces you will work 4 skip 5 work 4 1 create the foundation for the handles i repeat chain 6 single_crochet in next space for 1/3 of your spaces see above ii chain 47 skip about 1/3 of your spaces see above single_crochet in the next space iii repeat chain 6 single_crochet in next space for the remain 1/3 spaces on this side of the bag repeat the above 3 steps for the other side of the bag 2 work the first row of the handle i repeat chain 6 single_crochet in next space for 1/3 of your spaces you should now be at the handle chains ii chain 6 single_crochet in the 3rd chain on handle iii repeat chain 6 skip 6 chains single_crochet in next chain 6 times iv chain 6 skip remain chain 2 of the handle single_crochet in next space v repeat chain 6 single_crochet in next space until you come to the edge of the bag repeat the above 5 steps for the other side of the bag 3 work further handle rounds working around as for body repeat chain 6 single_crochet in next space for 2 or 3 complete rounds finishing at
